item.title: Norman Park - Litter around River Ravensbourne, 17th December
item.description:
Please can you conduct a thorough litter-pick around the River Ravensbourne running through Norman Park. Photo shows area that needs attention. Litter needs removing from: River banks In river itself Around benches/tables Within undergrowth, trees etc on all sides of river On grass areas This will require a little dexterity to reach some of the litter. Imagery is a selection of litter, not all of it is in plain sight. It would be appreciated if this request is carried out properly the first time of asking. Thanks in advance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Common, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On going flytipping issue at back of Roosters Hut, 17th December
item.description:
This problem has been occurring repeatedly over the last year and getting increasingly worse, with waste being dumped outside the property on a regular basis. The rubbish often includes e.g. household waste, furniture, large amounts of food waste. Which creates an unsightly environment, poses potential health and safety risks, increased pests in the area, and negatively impacts the local businesses, customers, and staff.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 181, Rye Lane, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous and uneven - resulted in a fall, 17th December
item.description:
Yesterday (16/12) whilst out walking my dog around 11:30am, I fell over in the street at this location on the uneven pavement and have sustained an injury to my left ankle, left index finger and damage to my right palm. I went over not noticing the state of the pavement but after being helped back to my feet, it is clear that there it is uneven, problematic to anyone walking (especially the elderly). i shall be raising a report and a complaint to the council and seeking damages.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bickley Road, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barrier left on pavement, 17th December
item.description:
